title: About Us
text:
Tejas Yalamanchili, a senior at Purdue University majoring in Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning and Systems Programming , is passionate about leveraging AI to solve real-world problems and improve lives through technology. Tejas combines his expertise in machine learning with a vision for creating impactful AI-driven solutions.  Aryan Jain, a senior at Purdue University majoring in Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning, brings a deep understanding of AI algorithms and their applications.
 Aryan is driven by a commitment to innovation and a focus on developing seamless, user-centric technologies. Together, they share a mission to revolutionize industries through cutting-edge AI solutions.
